name: get_all_companies_paginated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool business_and_company_name_api.
Tool description: Use this Know-Your-Business Process (KYB) API to validate registered companies and business names recognised by the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC). You have enpoints to search, validate name availability and validate and fetch business and company registration numbers.
API description: Fetches a paginated list of all companies from the CAC database using the provided API key.

limit.description: The number of companies to retrieve per page.
